title: Skin Condition Diagnosis

instructionSteps.uploadDesc: Take a clear photo of the affected skin area and upload it to the system. You can drag and drop your image here.
instructionSteps.analysisDesc: The system will analyze the image and predict the most likely skin condition among 7 possible classes.
instructionSteps.resultsDesc: Choose one of the explainable AI methods to see which areas of the image the model focused on.

notAuthTitle: Log In for a Better Experience
notAuthDesc: You don’t need to log in to continue. However, signing in lets you keep track of your requests and access more features.
analysis_failed: Image analysis failed. Please try again.

analysisStep.mostLikelyCondition: This is the most likely condition based on our analysis.
analysisStep.disclaimer: This analysis is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice.
analysisStep.no_results: No results were obtained from the image analysis. Please try again.
analysisStep.lowConfidenceMessage: We couldn't analyze your image with sufficient confidence. Please try again with a better quality image.
analysisStep.suggestion2: Make sure the focus is clear

xaiMethods.title: Explainable AI Method
xaiMethods.subtitle: Select a method to understand why this diagnosis was made
xaiMethods.gradcamDesc: Visualizes which image regions influenced the decision using gradients.
xaiMethods.limeDesc: Explains predictions by creating local interpretable models.
xaiMethods.shapDesc: Shows how much each part of the image contributed to the prediction using game theory concepts.
xaiMethods.anchorDesc: Identifies important regions that, if removed, would change the model’s decision.
xaiMethods.igDesc: Determines which pixels had the most impact by analyzing gradient changes.
xaiMethods.gradcamDescLong: Grad-CAM (Gradient-weighted Class Activation Mapping) highlights the areas that most influenced the AI’s decision by using gradient information from the final convolutional layer.
xaiMethods.limeDescLong: LIME (Local Interpretable Model-agnostic Explanations) explains why the AI made a specific prediction by intentionally altering parts of the image and building a simple model to show which areas had the most impact on the decision.
xaiMethods.shapDescLong: SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) estimates the contribution of each pixel to the model's prediction based on game theory.
xaiMethods.anchorDescLong: Anchor identifies the smallest parts of the image that independently ensure a stable prediction.
xaiMethods.igDescLong: Integrated Gradients show how the prediction changes as the input transitions from a baseline to the actual image.
xaiMethods.requestError: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
xaiMethods.noImageError: No image was uploaded. Please select a file before proceeding.
xaiMethods.waiting: Please wait. Explanation processing may take a few minutes...
